com.mitchellbosecke.pebble.template

Class EvaluationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mitchellbosecke.pebble.template.EvaluationContext

  • public class EvaluationContext
extends Object
    An evaluation context will store all stateful data that is necessary for the evaluation of a template. Passing the entire state around will assist with thread safety.
    Author:
    Mitchell

      • pushLocalScope

        public void pushLocalScope()
        Pushes a new scope that doesn't contain a reference to the current scope. This occurs for macros. Variable lookup will end at this scope.
